faq.answer: We are big proponents of Agile methodologies and use a combination of Scrum, XP and Kanban principles on almost every development project we undertake. A big percentage of our clients are based out of USA, Europe and Australia. With an experience of 7+ years, we have learnt quite some best practices to make distributed development work seamlessly.
faq.question: How do you do project management?

faq_565792159.answer: We ensure to keep our processes transparent with our clients by having two-way communication, daily updates and iterative development and tracking of issues & bugs. We do daily calls (at mutually convenient time), followed by an end of the day status update from the team. The process is further streamlined depending upon specific requirements as we move further.
faq_565792159.question: What are your processes around communication?

faq_704830743.answer: We use JIRA, Pivotal Tracker, Assembla, Basecamp and Trello for project management and bug tracking. We use Jenkins for continuous integration and Git for subversion control system. If client prefers to use any other tool set, we are very comfortable with that as well.
faq_704830743.question: Which issue tracker system / tools do you use?

faq.answer: We currently have more than 150 architects and developers in our Grails consulting and development team who have written books, contributed more than 15 plugins to Grails community and written more than 500 blogs on Grails.
faq.question: How many members do you have in Grails development team?

faq_309675921.answer: We have expertise working in both distributed as well as fully outsourced development model and use Agile practices and approach to work in an iterative and incremental manner. We prefer to work on Time & Material but also do fixed price model if the requirements and scoping is clearly laid out. In most of the cases, we deploy a dedicated team which only works on a single project.
faq_309675921.question: What are your engagement & pricing models?

faq_1530470483.answer: With over 100+ Grails applications built in varied domains and industries, 150+ team in Grails consulting and development, 15+ plugins contributed to Grails community, 500+ blogs on Grails and related ecosystem, we have not found anybody more experienced and passionate about this great framework than us. We also speak in eminent platforms such as GR8 conference. We have a dedicated team for contributing to open source community including developing the Grails framework itself.
faq_1530470483.question: Why choose TO THE NEW as your Grails development partner?
